summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for transportation charges incurred on February 12, 2001. The total amount due is $81.48 after applying a discount of $2.52. The invoice includes details about the service type and pickup information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the FedEx invoice for transportation services.

events.title: FedEx Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery to Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6809
keyFacts: The total charges for the FedEx services amount to $81.48.
A discount of $2.52 was applied to the invoice.
The package was picked up on February 12, 2001.
The invoice includes a remittance advice indicating payment is due by March 10, 2001.
